pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pyudkThis library provides Udwadia Kalaba constrained parameters and force quantities for Python 3 out of the box. The usage is mostly based on numpy and sympy library.## InstallationJust run pip install pyudk## Usage### Basic usageThe simplest usage would be import pyudk as udk Qc = udk.ideal_Constraint_force(m, q, A, b)
